cgcloud__Week_Day_Share_Profile__c.name: cgcloud__Week_Day_Share_Profile__c
cgcloud__Week_Day_Share_Profile__c.description: Contains statistical profiles of the distribution of weekly data among different days of a week.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Friday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Fridays = Friday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Friday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Fridays.

cgcloud__Monday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Mondays = Monday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Monday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Mondays.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the Week Day Share Profile belongs.

cgcloud__Saturday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Saturdays = Saturday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Saturday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Saturdays.

cgcloud__Sunday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Sundays = Sunday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Sunday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Sundays.

cgcloud__Thursday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Thursdays = Thursday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Thursday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Thursdays.

cgcloud__Total__c.description: Sum total of all input weekday values in the current profile.

cgcloud__Tuesday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Tuesdays = Tuesday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Tuesday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Tuesdays.

cgcloud__Wednesday_Percentage__c.description: Utilized share value on Wednesdays = Wednesday/Total. Rounded up to two decimal places.

cgcloud__Wednesday__c.description: Input value for the share valid on Wednesdays.
